article.title: Some Aspects of Subject Acquisition and Detailed Subject Retrieval of PatentInformation
article.author: Shenderov, V. Z.
article.text: Aspects of subject acquisition and retrieval of patent information are discussed.. A patent-information service system is conventionally separated into two parts: a subject acquisitions system designed for stock acquisition and search file building, and a detailed subject retrieval system designed to deal with specific user requests.. The performance of both systems is analyzed using patent classifications as examples.. The tasks of classification research in relation to subject acquisitions system requirements are formulated..
